騱字的基本解释

騱
xí
前脚全白的马。

騱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xí］
(1)前足全白的马。
(2)见“驒2騱”。

騱字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【馬字部】　騱； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1442第36
【集韻】堅奚切，音雞。【爾雅·釋畜】前足皆白騱。　又【唐韻】胡雞切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】弦雞切，?音奚。義同。　又【說文】驒騱，馬也。【前漢·司馬相如傳】騊駼驒騱。　又通作奚。【前漢·匈奴傳】奇畜則橐駝驒奚。【師古曰】驒奚，駏驉類。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji 1】【Horse Character Department】　騱; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 1442 Page 36
[Ji Yun] Jian Xi cut, sound chicken. 【Erya·Shihu】The forefoot are all white horses.　[Tang Yun] Hu Ji cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Xian Ji cut,? Yin Xi. The same meaning.　[Speaking of the text] 驒騱, the horse also. 【Previous Han·Sima Xiangru Biography】騊駼駼騱.　It's all over again. [Previous Han·Xiongnu Biography] The strange animal stalks the camel. [Shi Gu said] Xi Xi, Xi Xi, type.
